label: A2B_oP12_60_d_c-003
title: $\alpha$-PbO$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
(Hill, 1982) states the Pb site is only 49\% occupied, so stoichiometrically this compound is closer to PbO$_{4}$. On the other hand, the ICSD entry gives lists 98\% occupation, which is in better agreement with the claimed stoichiometry. 
 This structure has the same AFLOW label as \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_60_d_c-001}{$\zeta$-Fe$_{2}$N}, but in that case the nitrogen site is fully occupied. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
